data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: To get full marks you are going to have to think of some ways to improve your project. Saying ____ like: `` I would ____ it ____ '' ____ not ____ enough. What ____ that ____ mean? `` I would ____ more ____ '' ____ equally ____ unless ____ mention ____ this ____ make ____ system ____. These extensions must be SMART!
data.partBlankContent: To get full marks you are going to have to think of some ways to improve your project. Saying some_____ like: `` I would ma__ it bet___ '' i_ not go__ enough. What do__ that ev__ mean? `` I would a__ more lev___ '' i_ equally na___ unless y__ mention h__ this wo___ make t__ system bet___. These extensions must be SMART!
data.answer: 为了得到满分，你必须想一些方法来改进你的项目。说“我会让它变得更好”这样的话是不够的。这到底是什么意思?“我会添加更多关卡”同样是幼稚的想法，除非你提到这将如何改善系统。这些扩展必须是聪明的!
